Per @golfodds, early betting action at @SuperBookUSA has been lopsided on nine of the day’s 12 games. 

Eighty percent or more of the early money wagered on the Saints, Jets, Bucs, Packers, Patriots, Jaguars, Bears, Chargers and Eagles.

Over 90% of $$ on #Patriots, #FlyEaglesFly and #GoPackGo at @WilliamHillUS.

Some big decisions for books https://t.co/ebNsYZRUOL
The #Bills (+7) are now up 24-0 on the New York Jets. Bills backers can probably start figure out what to do with their winnings.

The O/U for Jets-Bills closed 37.5.

The #BillsMafia have gone OVER that themselves, now up 38-10 at the end of 3Q.
#Duke (-39) beats Army 94-72, but fails to cover the hefty spread.
Everyone on Cardinals +16.5 just held their breathe there ...
The #Cardinals (+15.5) lose 26-14, but cover against the #ChiefsKindgom. Kansas City drops to 8-2 ATS on the season.

Lot of late $$ coming in on #GoPackGo, as line is up to GB -13 at some shops. 

Was GB -9 earlier in the week.

The Kansas City Chiefs become the first team to cash its season win total bet, cashing the OVER 8.5.

Chiefs are now 9-1 (8-2 ATS).

Best bets for Eagles-Cowboys from @SharpFootball and @SportsCheetah:

https://t.co/BY5FtCVrIp
This Raiders (+9.5.) non-cover is going to be a tough one to swallow.

The Week 11 Rams (-1) vs. Chiefs game has with a TOTAL of 64 at @SuperBookUSA.  

That's the highest total in our database, going back to 1986.

A good resource for bettors: How much all 32 NFL QBs are worth to the spread (via @DougESPN):

https://t.co/xlA6WjphVX
It is blasphemous to say as a Vikings fan, but those #GoPackGo unis are pretty fresh.

I know other QBs have more Super Bowls, but there hasn't been a more naturally talented QB than Aaron Rodgers.

Still doesn't look fully healthy, but when he can run -- watch out.
The #Seahawks may have replaced last season’s #Eagles squad atop the best TD celebration team mantle.
How are the #Seahawks winning this game?
Russell Wilson just doesn’t seem to have that scary-elite escape ability anymore. Seems like he’s caught from behind a lot more when he climbs pocket. #Seahawks
At least it’s Friday ... https://t.co/o8lcE3udw4
